mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, deadline, allow_anonymous, require_login, max_file_size, allowed_types, max_file_count, created_by, status, collection_type, created_at, updated_at FROM collection_task WHERE id = CAST(#{id} AS VARCHAR)

SELECT id, title, description, deadline, allow_anonymous, require_login, max_file_size, allowed_types, max_file_count, created_by, status, collection_type, created_at, updated_at FROM collection_task WHERE CAST(created_by AS VARCHAR) = #{createdBy} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection_task ( id, title, description, deadline, allow_anonymous, require_login, max_file_size, allowed_types, max_file_count, created_by, status, collection_type, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{deadline}, #{allowAnonymous}, #{requireLogin}, #{maxFileSize}, #{allowedTypes, jdbcType=ARRAY, typeHandler=com.idropin.infrastructure.config.StringArrayTypeHandler}, #{maxFileCount}, #{createdBy}, #{status}, #{collectionType}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
